DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00030: A segment specifying general dates and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the invoice date. Examples of the use of this DTM segment is: 'shipped on date' or 'delivery date'.

PAI.label: Payment instructions
PAI.description: 00040: A segment requesting or confirming conditions of payment, guarantee and method of payment for the whole invoice. An example of the use of this segment is to specify the type of documentary credit used in the transaction.

ALI.label: Additional information
ALI.description: 00050: A segment indicating special conditions related to the total invoice owing to origin, customs preference or other commercial factors.

IMD.label: Item description
IMD.description: 00060: A segment providing a description common to all line items of the invoice.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 00070: A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

GROUP.label: SG1
GROUP.description: 00080: A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, related identification numbers, locations, measurements, quantities, free text and monetary amounts, relating to the whole message, e.g. contract information, import or export license information, despatch advice information.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00090: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00100: A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG2
GROUP.description: 00110: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.

NAD.label: Name and address
NAD.description: 00120: A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the invoice. Identification of the seller and buyer parties is mandatory for the invoice message. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified e.g. The Buyer and Seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required, but the Consignee or Delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 00130: A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

FII.label: Financial institution information
FII.description: 00140: A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g. bank) and relevant account numbers for the seller, buyer and where necessary other parties.

GROUP.label: SG3
GROUP.description: 00150: A group of segment for giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole invoice.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00160: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00170: A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG4
GROUP.description: 00180: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

DOC.label: Document/message details
DOC.description: 00190: A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00200: A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

GROUP.label: SG5
GROUP.description: 00210: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

CTA.label: Contact information
CTA.description: 00220: A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

COM.label: Communication contact
COM.description: 00230: A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

GROUP.label: SG6
GROUP.description: 00240: A group of segments specifying tax related information, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

TAX.label: Duty/tax/fee details
TAX.description: 00250: A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate or exemption, relating to the whole invoice e.g. Value Added Tax at the standard rate is applicable for all items.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 00260: A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 00270: A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state or country tax.

GROUP.label: SG7
GROUP.description: 00280: A group of segments specifying the currencies and related dates/periods valid for the whole invoice. Currency data maybe omitted in national applications but will be required for international transactions.

CUX.label: Currencies
CUX.description: 00290: A segment identifying the currencies required in the invoice e.g. the invoice currency. A rate of exchange may be given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00300: A segment specifying the date/time/period related to the rate of exchange.

GROUP.label: SG8
GROUP.description: 00310: A group of segments specifying the terms of payment applicable for the whole invoice.

PAT.label: Payment terms
PAT.description: 00320: A segment identifying the payment terms and date/time basis.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00330: A segment giving the specific date/time/period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, instalments etc.

PCD.label: Percentage details
PCD.description: 00340: A segment specifying the discount, interest, penalty as well as instalment percentage.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 00350: A segment specifying amounts related to payment discount penalties or instalments.

PAI.label: Payment instructions
PAI.description: 00360: To specify the instructions for payment.

FII.label: Financial institution information
FII.description: 00370: To identify an account and a related financial institution.

GROUP.label: SG9
GROUP.description: 00380: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, contract of carriage, location and relevant dates and times for transportation, relating to the whole invoice.

TDT.label: Transport information
TDT.description: 00390: A segment specifying the mode, means and identification of the transport for the goods being invoiced.

GROUP.label: SG10
GROUP.description: 00400: A group of segments giving the location and date/time information relative to the transportation.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 00410: A segment identifying locations relevant to the transport specified in the TDT segment e.g. place of departure or border crossing point.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00420: A segment identifying the date/time details of departure and/or arrival of the transported goods for the specified location.

GROUP.label: SG11
GROUP.description: 00430: A group of segments to allow reference to transport details.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00440: A segment giving reference to transport details.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00450: A segment giving date/time/period on the above reference.

GROUP.label: SG12
GROUP.description: 00460: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the whole invoice.

TOD.label: Terms of delivery or transport
TOD.description: 00470: A segment identifying the delivery terms used e.g. INCOTERMS, code could be used to specify the delivery terms.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 00480: A segment identifying locations relevant to the delivery terms specified in the TOD segment.

GROUP.label: SG13
GROUP.description: 00490: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions and marks and numbers for goods referenced by the whole invoice.

PAC.label: Package
PAC.description: 00500: A segment specifying the number and type of packages for the whole invoice, e.g. number and type of pallets.

MEA.label: Measurements
MEA.description: 00510: A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the PAC segment. e.g. package length, weight.

GROUP.label: SG14
GROUP.description: 00520: A group of segments specifying the markings and labels on individual physical units.

PCI.label: Package identification
PCI.description: 00530: A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00540: A segment identifying the master label number.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00550: A segment specifying the dates relevant to the package markings.

GIN.label: Goods identity number
GIN.description: 00560: A segment identifying the number or ranges of numbers for use with the package markings.

GROUP.label: SG15
GROUP.description: 00570: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the whole invoice. The allowance or charge specified within this Segment group may either relate to the total invoice in which case it cannot be overridden at detail level, or it can relate to the line items as a default allowance/charge and can be overridden by the ALC Segment group within the detail section. Where relevant, additional information, tax and alternate currency details are to be indicated in the TAX and MOA segments.

ALC.label: Allowance or charge
ALC.description: 00580: A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary, its calculation sequence.

ALI.label: Additional information
ALI.description: 00590: A segment indicating that allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

GROUP.label: SG16
GROUP.description: 00600: A group of segment for giving references and where necessary, their dates relating to the allowances or charges.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00610: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00620: A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG17
GROUP.description: 00630: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is greater than 1000 pieces.

QTY.label: Quantity
QTY.description: 00640: A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 00650: A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

GROUP.label: SG18
GROUP.description: 00660: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

PCD.label: Percentage details
PCD.description: 00670: A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 00680: A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

GROUP.label: SG19
GROUP.description: 00690: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of 5000 BEF may be specified if goods value ordered is greater than 100000 BEF.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 00700: A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 00710: A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

GROUP.label: SG20
GROUP.description: 00720: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. the allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

RTE.label: Rate details
RTE.description: 00730: A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 00740: A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance/charge rate.

GROUP.label: SG21
GROUP.description: 00750: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge and, when necessary.

TAX.label: Duty/tax/fee details
TAX.description: 00760: A segment specifying the tax type, category and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 00770: A segment specifying the amount for the allowance or charge.

GROUP.label: SG22
GROUP.description: 00780: A group of segments identifying any rules, laws or regulations with which the supplier must comply to meet requirements e.g. building regulations, safety requirements, etc.

RCS.label: Requirements and conditions
RCS.description: 00790: A segment to enable industry or national requirements to be specified.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 00800: A segment identifying the referenced document by its number and, where appropriate, a line number.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00810: A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 00820: A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

GROUP.label: SG23
GROUP.description: 00830: A segment group to give information about adjustment.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 00850: A segment giving additional information on the adjustment.

GROUP.label: SG24
GROUP.description: 00860: A segment group giving the possibility in a reply to INVOIC of instructing the other party of the action to be taken.

INP.label: Parties and instruction
INP.description: 00870: A segment giving information on parties to instruction.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 00880: A segment giving additional information about parties to instruction.

GROUP.label: SG25
GROUP.description: 00890: EQD-FTX-DGS-SG28-SG29-SG30-SG31-SG32-SG34-SG35- SG36-SG40-SG46-SG48-SG49-SG50-SG51 A group of segments providing details of the individual invoiced items. There must be at least one occurrence of this segment group within an invoice, but not necessarily in a credit note or a debit note. This Segment group may be repeated to give sub-lin

LIN.label: Line item
LIN.description: 00900: A segment identifying the line item by the line number and configuration level, and additionally, identifying the product or service invoiced. Other product identification numbers, e.g. Buyer product number etc., can be specified within the following PIA segment.

PIA.label: Additional product id
PIA.description: 00910: A segment providing either additional identification to the product specified in the LIN segment (e.g. Harmonized System number), or provides any substitute product identification.

PGI.label: Product group information
PGI.description: 00920: A segment identifying the product or price group.

IMD.label: Item description
IMD.description: 00930: A segment for describing the product or service being invoiced as well as product characteristic. This segment should be used for products or services that cannot be fully identified by a product code or article number.

MEA.label: Measurements
MEA.description: 00930: A segment enabling the physical measurements of the invoiced item to be specified where this is required for full identification of the product. Any measurements must refer to the product in its unpacked form e.g. thickness of plastic film, length, weight, etc.

QTY.label: Quantity
QTY.description: 00940: A segment identifying the product quantities e.g. invoiced quantity.

PCD.label: Percentage details
PCD.description: 00950: A segment specifying the strength or yield of a product as a percentage e.g. 80% to indicate the strength of an Acid.

ALI.label: Additional information
ALI.description: 00960: A segment indicating that the line item is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference, embargo regulations or commercial factors.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 00970: A segment specifying date/time/period details relating to the line item only.

GIN.label: Goods identity number
GIN.description: 00980: A segment providing identity numbers to be applied to the goods being invoiced, e.g. serial numbers for assembled equipment.

GIR.label: Related identification numbers
GIR.description: 00990: A segment providing sets of related identification numbers for a line item, e.g. engine numbers, chassis number and transmission number for a vehicle.

QVR.label: Quantity variances
QVR.description: 01000: A segment identifying quantity variances, between, e.g. quantity delivered/invoiced and quantity ordered.

EQD.label: Equipment details
EQD.description: 01010: A segment to specify the type and size of equipment being billed.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 01020: A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

GROUP.label: SG26
GROUP.description: 01030: A group of segments specifying any monetary amounts relating to the products and when necessary a currency.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01040: A segment specifying any monetary amounts relating to the product, e.g. item amount, insurance value, customs value.

CUX.label: Currencies
CUX.description: 01050: A segment identifying the currencies required in the line item, when is different from the heading currencies. A rate of exchange may given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

GROUP.label: SG27
GROUP.description: 01060: A group of segments specifying the terms of payment for the line item where this is different to that specified in the heading section.

PAT.label: Payment terms
PAT.description: 01070: A segment identifying the payment terms and date/time basis.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01080: A segment giving the specific date/time/period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, instalments etc.

PCD.label: Percentage details
PCD.description: 01090: A segment specifying discount, interest, penalty as well as instalment percentage.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01100: A segment specifying amounts related to payment discount penalties or instalments.

GROUP.label: SG28
GROUP.description: 01110: A group of segments identifying the relevant pricing information for the goods or services invoiced.

PRI.label: Price details
PRI.description: 01110: A segment to specify the price type and amount. The price used in the calculation of the line amount will be identified as 'Price'. Indication of 'net price' or 'gross price' can be given in 5387 'Price specification code'.

APR.label: Additional price information
APR.description: 01130: A segment to identify pricing information such as a price multiplier, the class or type of trade and additionally identifying the reason for any changes.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 01140: A segment to identify the ranges (quantity, amount, etc.) to which the additional price information applies.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01150: A segment to identify the date/time/period information related to the price change. e.g. period of validity.

GROUP.label: SG29
GROUP.description: 01160: A group giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the line item.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 01170: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01180: A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG30
GROUP.description: 01190: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions, and marks and numbers for goods referenced in the line item.

PAC.label: Package
PAC.description: 01200: A segment specifying the number and type of packages for the line item, e.g. number and type of pallets.

MEA.label: Measurements
MEA.description: 01210: A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the PAC segment e.g. package length, weight.

GROUP.label: SG31
GROUP.description: 01220: A group of segments specifying the markings and labels on individual physical units.

PCI.label: Package identification
PCI.description: 01230: A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 01240: A segment identifying the master label number.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01250: A segment specifying the dates relevant to the package markings.

GIN.label: Goods identity number
GIN.description: 01260: A segment identifying the number or ranges of numbers for use with the package markings.

GROUP.label: SG32
GROUP.description: 01270: A group of segments specifying destination and quantity details for consignments involving multi-destination deliveries for a specified line item.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 01280: A segment indicating the location to which part of the consignment has been delivered.

QTY.label: Quantity
QTY.description: 01290: A segment specifying the quantity delivered to the identified location.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01300: A segment specifying the dates and/or times that the delivery has been made.

GROUP.label: SG33
GROUP.description: 01310: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the line item, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

TAX.label: Duty/tax/fee details
TAX.description: 01320: A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate, or exemption, relating to the line item.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01330: A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 01340: A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state or country tax.

GROUP.label: SG34
GROUP.description: 01350: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information, relevant to the line item only.

NAD.label: Name and address
NAD.description: 01360: A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the line item.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 01370: A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

GROUP.label: SG35
GROUP.description: 01380: A group of segment for giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole line item.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 01390: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01400: A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG36
GROUP.description: 01410: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

DOC.label: Document/message details
DOC.description: 01420: A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01430: A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

GROUP.label: SG37
GROUP.description: 01440: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

CTA.label: Contact information
CTA.description: 01450: A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

COM.label: Communication contact
COM.description: 01460: A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

GROUP.label: SG38
GROUP.description: 01470: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the line item where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

ALC.label: Allowance or charge
ALC.description: 01480: A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary its calculation sequence.

ALI.label: Additional information
ALI.description: 01490: A segment indicating that allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01500: To specify date, and/or time, or period.

GROUP.label: SG39
GROUP.description: 01510: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is greater than 1000 pieces.

QTY.label: Quantity
QTY.description: 01520: A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 01530: A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

GROUP.label: SG40
GROUP.description: 01540: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

PCD.label: Percentage details
PCD.description: 01550: A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 01560: A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

GROUP.label: SG41
GROUP.description: 01570: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of 5000 BEF may be specified if goods value ordered is greater than 100000 BEF.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01580: A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 01590: A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

GROUP.label: SG42
GROUP.description: 01600: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

RTE.label: Rate details
RTE.description: 01610: A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

RNG.label: Range details
RNG.description: 01620: A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance/charge rate.

GROUP.label: SG43
GROUP.description: 01630: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge and, when necessary.

TAX.label: Duty/tax/fee details
TAX.description: 01640: A segment specifying the tax type, category, and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01650: A segment specifying the amount for the allowance or charge.

GROUP.label: SG44
GROUP.description: 01660: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates and times for transportation, relating to the line item, where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

TDT.label: Transport information
TDT.description: 01670: A segment specifying the mode, means and identification of the transport for the goods in the line item.

GROUP.label: SG45
GROUP.description: 01680: A group of segments giving the location and date/time information relative to the transportation.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 01690: A segment identifying locations relevant to the transport specified in the TDT segment e.g. place of departure or border crossing point.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01700: A segment identifying the date/time details of departure and/or arrival of the transported goods for the specified location.

GROUP.label: SG46
GROUP.description: 01710: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the line item where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

TOD.label: Terms of delivery or transport
TOD.description: 01720: A segment identifying the delivery terms used. e.g. INCOTERMS, code could be used to specify the delivery terms.

LOC.label: Place/location identification
LOC.description: 01730: A segment identifying locations relevant to the delivery terms specified in the TOD segment.

GROUP.label: SG47
GROUP.description: 01740: A group of segments identifying for the line item - where this is different to or not specified within the Heading section - any rules, laws or regulations with which the supplier must comply to meet requirements. e.g. building regulations, safety requirements etc.

RCS.label: Requirements and conditions
RCS.description: 01750: A segment to enable industry or national requirements to be specified.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 01760: A segment identifying the referenced document by its number and, where appropriate, a line number.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01770: A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

FTX.label: Free text
FTX.description: 01780: A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

UNS.label: Section control
UNS.description: 01790: A mandatory service segment placed before the first user segment in the summary section to avoid segment collision.

CNT.label: Control total
CNT.description: 01800: A segment by which control totals may be provided by the sender for checking by the receiver.

GROUP.label: SG48
GROUP.description: 01810: A group of segments giving total amounts for the whole invoice and - if relevant -detailing amounts pre-paid with relevant references and dates.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01820: A segment giving the total amounts for the whole invoice message such as message monetary amount, message line item total amount, amount subject to payment discount, amount subject to tax, alternative currency total amount, total additional amount, sub- total amounts prepaid, total amount prepaid.

GROUP.label: SG49
GROUP.description: 01830: A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating e.g. amounts prepaid number.

RFF.label: Reference
RFF.description: 01840: A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

DTM.label: Date/time/period
DTM.description: 01850: A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

GROUP.label: SG50
GROUP.description: 01860: A group of segments specifying taxes totals for the invoice.

TAX.label: Duty/tax/fee details
TAX.description: 01870: A segment specifying the tax type to be summarized.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01880: A segment specifying the summary amount for the tax specified.

GROUP.label: SG51
GROUP.description: 01870: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges summary totals for the invoice.

ALC.label: Allowance or charge
ALC.description: 01880: A segment identifying the charge or allowance type to be summarised.

ALI.label: Additional information
ALI.description: 01890: A segment indicating that allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

MOA.label: Monetary amount
MOA.description: 01900: A segment specifying the summary amount for the allowance or charge.
